meaningMnemonic: Give <radical>alcohol</radical> to a <radical>demon</radical> and you'll see how <kanji>ugly</kanji> it really is. Demons need to concentrate to keep their disguises going. Even if it looked pretty when you met it, like super handsome, give it a few drinks and its facade will slide off and reveal its super gross demon face.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>ugly</kanji> demon is drunk and taking off his <reading>shoe</reading>s (しゅう) and swinging them around his head. And, oh no, he's drinking more alcohol out of the shoes.
